channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Will Trump Sell His Big Policy Bill to the American Public?

item.title: Mamdani Identified as Asian and African American on College Application

item.title: Trump Says Call with Putin Yields No Progress on Ukraine Cease-Fire
item.description: The apparent impasse came during a roughly hourlong conversation between the leaders on Thursday morning.

item.title: Iran’s Quiet Campaign of Domestic Terror
item.description: The regime is sending a chilling message: Dissent equals death.

item.title: From Cooking on TV to Feeding the Front Line in Ukraine
item.description: This chef appeared on TV before joining the army when Russia invaded in 2022. Now he makes his borscht for troops instead of cooking show judges.
